caption.p: Principal component analysis (PCA) of the essential-oil composition of published T. capitatum based on the principal classes of compounds: monoterpene hydrocarbons (MH), oxygenated monoterpenes (MO), sesquiterpenes hydrocarbons (SH), and oxygenated sesquiterpenes (OS) and others (O). The vectors shown are the eigenvectors of the covariance matrix. The plants codes are reported in Table 2.
